shit!! it didn't work. I am so close, I don't know what I am doing wrong. I downloaded powerISO, extracted the files, i have imgburn, I got the BDMV and certificate folders, followed the instructions, burned it and it can't be read on my bd player. all help will be appreciated. if i get it right for this one, i can download all of HD-R-US other movies. thanks.

dbel108 - Firstly, there is no .rar file. It is a disk image file, an iso. Secondly, you didn't need to extract the files/folders if you wanted to burn it. Your PS3 is an AVCHD compatible blu-ray player, but have you confirmed that your Sharp blu-ray player is AVCHD compatible?
firstly, thanks HD for your fast comment and help. My sharp bluray is in fact AVCHD compatible. Is there anything else you think may be wrong? thanks.

If you cannot play this, try burning it to disc or mounting the ISO, then open the disc in your computer (right click on the drive and select "Open"), go to the \BDMV\STREAM directory and play the file 0000.m2ts with VLC or Windows Media Player. It works.
